languages.text: {n}Что-то вздрагивает в глубине застывшего взгляда Кибеллы — и сразу же прячется за вуалью куртуазности.{/n} "Мы все играем роли, Домин'{name}. Истина скрыта глубже, чем зрят глаза и слышат уши".

traits.locale_text: {n}Что-то вздрагивает в глубине взгляда Кибеллы — и сразу же прячется за вуалью куртуазности.{/n} "Мы все играем роли, Эним'{name}. Истина скрыта куда глубже, чем зрят глаза и слышат уши".

languages.text: {n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Domin'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то вздрагивает в глубине застывшего взгляда Кибеллы — и сразу же прячется за вуалью куртуазности.{/n} "Мы все играем роли, Домин'{name}. Истина скрыта глубже, чем зрят глаза и слышат уши".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something flinches inside Kibellah, something in her momentarily unmoving gaze — but then immediately disappears behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Enim'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

{n}Something flinches inside Kibellah, something in her momentarily unmoving gaze — but then immediately disappears behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Enim'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

{n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Enim'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

{n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Enim'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

{n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Domin'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

{n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Domin'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

languages.text: {n}Irgendetwas in Kibellah, in ihrem eben noch reglosen Blick, zuckt zusammen ... verschwindet dann aber sofort wieder hinter dem Schleier der Höflichkeit.{/n} "Wir alle müssen unsere Rolle spielen, Domin'{name}. Die Wahrheit liegt oft tiefer, als unsere Augen und Ohren reichen."
languages.original_text: {n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Domin'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendetwas in Kibellah, in ihrem eben noch reglosen Blick, zuckt zusammen ... verschwindet dann aber sofort wieder hinter dem Schleier der Höflichkeit.{/n} "Wir alle müssen unsere Rolle spielen, Domin'{name}. Die Wahrheit liegt oft tiefer, als unsere Augen und Ohren reichen."

languages.text: {n}Algo en Kibellah, en su mirada inmóvil por un segundo, se encoge... pero vuelve a desaparecer de inmediato tras el velo de la cortesía.{/n} «Todos tenemos que representar nuestro papel, Domin'{name}. La verdad suele yacer donde nuestros ojos y oídos no llegan».
languages.original_text: {n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Domin'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo en Kibellah, en su mirada inmóvil por un segundo, se encoge... pero vuelve a desaparecer de inmediato tras el velo de la cortesía.{/n} «Todos tenemos que representar nuestro papel, Domin'{name}. La verdad suele yacer donde nuestros ojos y oídos no llegan».

languages.text: {n}束の間、動くことのない視線の中で、キベラの中で何かが反応する。しかし、すぐにまた儀礼的なヴェールの無効に消えてしまう。{/n}「誰もがみんな、それぞれに役割を担っているのよ、ドミン・{name}。真実は時に、私たちの目や耳が届くところよりも深い場所に存在するの」
languages.original_text: {n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Domin'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

traits.locale_text: {n}束の間、動くことのない視線の中で、キベラの中で何かが反応する。しかし、すぐにまた儀礼的なヴェールの無効に消えてしまう。{/n}「誰もがみんな、それぞれに役割を担っているのよ、エニム・{name}。真実は時に、私たちの目や耳が届くところよりも深い場所に存在するの」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈顿了顿，一动不动地凝视着你。她内心有什么东西动摇了，但随后，这一切立刻消失在了她温文尔雅的假面之下。{/n}“我们每个人都有要扮演的角色，秘者{name}。真相往往隐藏在耳目无法触及的地方。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Domin'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈顿了顿，一动不动地凝视着你。她内心有什么东西动摇了，但随后，这一切立刻消失在了她温文尔雅的假面之下。{/n}“我们每个人都有要扮演的角色，秘者{name}。真相往往隐藏在耳目无法触及的地方。”

languages.text: {n}Dans le regard momentanément fixe de Kibellah, quelque chose tressaille, mais disparaît tout aussi vite derrière le voile de la courtoisie.{/n} « Nous avons tous un rôle à jouer, Domin'{name}. La vérité est souvent enfouie bien trop profondément pour que nos yeux et nos oreilles puissent l'atteindre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Domin'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans le regard momentanément fixe de Kibellah, quelque chose tressaille, mais disparaît tout aussi vite derrière le voile de la courtoisie.{/n} « Nous avons tous un rôle à jouer, Domin'{name}. La vérité est souvent enfouie bien trop profondément pour que nos yeux et nos oreilles puissent l'atteindre. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın içinde, bir anlığına sabitlenen bakışlarında yatan bir şey irkiliyor. Ardından kibarlık perdesinin ardına saklanarak aniden gözden kayboluyor.{/n} "Hepimizin oynayacak bir rolü var Domin'{name}. Hakikat, sıklıkla gözlerimizin ve kulaklarımızın erişebileceğinden daha derinde yatar."
languages.original_text: {n}Something inside Kibellah, in her momentarily unmoving gaze, flinches — but then immediately disappears again behind the veil of courtliness.{/n} "We all have our parts to play, Domin'{name}. The truth oftentimes lies deeper than where our eyes and ears can reach."
